com.rolledback.framework

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rolledback.framework.Coordinate

  • public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic implementation of a Coordinate class. Very similar to the Java Point class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Rayermann (rolledback, www.github.com/rolledback, www.cs.utexas.edu/~mrayer)

      Basic constructor.
      Coordinate(int x, int y, double b)
      Secondary constructor which also sets the bonus value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coordinate

        public Coordinate(int x,
          int y)
        Basic constructor.
        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the coordinate
        y - the y value of the coordinate

      • Coordinate

        public Coordinate(int x,
          int y,
          double b)
        Secondary constructor which also sets the bonus value. Used by two of the AI classes. No other use for it.
        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the coordinate
        y - the y value of the coordinate
        b - the value of to be stored in bonus
